alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bergen, southern Westchester and Rockland Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pomona, or near Monsey, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Bergenfield, Monsey, Nanuet, Haverstraw, Tarrytown, Dobbs Ferry, Suffern, Nyack, Tappan, Pearl River, Oradell, Norwood, Orangeburg and Pomona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
